member.name: ISyncMgrSynchronizeCallback.DeleteLogError
member.summary: Called by the registered application's handler to delete a previously logged ErrorInformation, warning, or error message in the error tab on the synchronization manager status dialog box.
member.param: The LogError to be deleted. If ErrorID is GUID_NULL all errors logged by the instance of the registered application's handler will be deleted.

returns.para: This method supports the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following:

listheader.description: The item was successfully deleted from the log.

member.name: ISyncMgrSynchronizeCallback.EnableModeless
member.summary: Called by the registered application before and after any dialog boxes are displayed from within the and methods.
member.param: TRUE if the registered application is requesting permission to display a dialog box or FALSE if the registered application has finished displaying a dialog box.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The dialog box should not be displayed.

member.name: ISyncMgrSynchronizeCallback.EstablishConnection
member.summary: Called by the registered application's handler when a network connection is required.
member.param: The name of the connection to dial.

returns.para: This method supports the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, and E_OUTOFMEMORY, as well as the following:

member.name: ISyncMgrSynchronizeCallback.LogError
member.summary: Called by a registered application to log information, warning, or an error message into the error tab on the synchronization manager status dialog box.
member.param: The error level. Values are taken from the enumeration.
A pointer to error text to be displayed in the error tab.
A pointer to the structure that contains additional error information. Registered applications that do not provide this data can pass NULL.

returns.para: This method supports the standard return values E_INVALIDARG, E_UNEXPECTED, and E_OUTOFMEMORY, and the following:

listheader.description: The error information is logged successfully.

member.name: ISyncMgrSynchronizeCallback.PrepareForSyncCompleted
member.summary: Called by a registered handler of an application after the method is complete.
member.param: The return value of the method. If S_OK is returned, the synchronization manager calls for the item. If the HRESULT is set to anything other than S_OK, the synchronization manager releases the handler without calling the Synchronize method.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ISyncMgrSynchronizeCallback.Progress
member.summary: Called by a registered application to update the progress information and determine whether an operation should continue.
member.param: A reference to the item identifier for an item that is being updated.
A pointer to a structure that contains the updated progress information.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: Cancels the synchronization on a specified item, as soon as possible.
Cancels the synchronization on all items that are associated with this application, as soon as possible.

member.name: ISyncMgrSynchronizeCallback.ShowErrorCompleted
member.summary: Called by the registered application's handler before or after its operation has been completed.
member.param: Whether was successful. This value is S_SYNCMGR_RETRYSYNC if the registered application's handler requires SyncMgr to retry the synchronization. When this value is returned to SyncMgr both the and methods are called again.
The number of items in the array pointed to by the pItemIDs parameter. This parameter is ignored unless hrResult is S_SYNCMGR_RETRYSYNC.
A pointer to the array of item IDs to pass to in the event of a retry. This parameter is ignored unless hrResult is S_SYNCMGR_RETRYSYNC.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ISyncMgrSynchronizeCallback.ShowPropertiesCompleted
member.summary: Called by the registered application's handler before or after its operation is completed.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ISyncMgrSynchronizeCallback.SynchronizeCompleted
member.summary: Called by an application when its method is complete.
member.param: The returned result from the method.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

member.name: ISyncMgrSynchronizeCallback
member.summary: Exposes methods that manage the synchronization process.
